评论详情: Didnt realize they were bell bottoms (which are totally out of style)

The fit is comfortable. I’m 5’5 and the length is perfect for me. I like that the pants have pockets on the sides. The only thing I don’t like is the fact that they visibly look like yoga pants and not more business casual.

These pants are comfortable and have the right amount of stretch!  They were a bit longer and more flared than I was expecting them to be, so I'll have to hem them, but that isn't a huge deal. Plus they have pockets!!

I needed an XL for the waist and hips in these but they are about 3” too long. I’ll have to have them hemmed to wear them. They are very comfortable but I don’t feel they give much tummy control to be advertised as such. I do like the fit though everywhere besides the length and once they are hemmed I think I’ll be wearing these often. I’m not so sure they are exactly office worthy but in a casual environment they’ll be fine.

评论概述: Super comfortable - Not confining - Flare looks great with any kind of shoe from flats to sneakers
评论详情: I love these leggings! The listing shows them as being "business casual" and while they can be paired with any kind of shirt or sweater, they are basically made out of the same stretchy material that yoga pants are made of without being shiny. They're easy to pull on/off, they're not confining and the high waist doesn't dig in or roll down.  I am 5'6 and I love the length. They're longer than most, and with a platform sneaker, these almost touch the ground, but I prefer that. Because they're longer than most, they can be work with a higher heeled shoe. The flare stars just below the knee but isn't such a bell bottom flare that it's goofy looking. It's a nice simple flare that looks great with any kind of shoe, and they're not too thin like some yoga pants can be. They're truly opaque.  Love the quality and fit! Definitely recommend.

I ordered an XL, which is standard sizing for me in pants of this style. Generally a standard inseam is about right for me (at 5'7" with proportionate measurements), and I think that's usually 31-32" depending on brand. These leggings were like 2" too long, so they dragged on the ground when I didn't have shoes on. That's nice for wearing larger heels or taller platforms but annoying when you're lounging at home. Otherwise, these are exceptionally comfortable and seem well made. The pockets fit my phone and the waistband is comfortable and not too tight, but does not slide down either. I may try to hem them a bit so I can wear them with sandals or just slippers around the house without them dragging on the ground.

These pants are stretchy like yoga pants, but they shouldn't be advertised as work pants. They fit well and are comfortable. They have a flared leg and are fitted in the thigh area. However, they are very thin - definitely too thin for work. They are actually thinner than other yoga pants that I own. If you're buying to wear casually around the house or to run errands, they are great, but I wouldn't wear them anywhere nice.

评论概述: They are not as professional looking as they do on the images
评论详情: I ordered the black ones, instead the color is off black The stitches make it look just a like a workout legging Material is rather thin

These yoga pants are designed and stitched well, with no thread pulls or other sewing issues. The fabric is between light and mid-weight thickness and soft. They fit according to the size chart. They're slimming and work well for casual or business. They washed and dried well and there is no piling.

These leggings are extremely comfortable and so flattering on the body. I ordered them in navy and the color is pretty, exactly what I was hoping for. I got a medium size which fits well overall, though they are a tad long (I am 5'6" and 145 lbs). I really love both the high waistband, it's comfortable and not tight and how the seaming details and faux fly front make these leggings look more stylish. The side pockets are designed well because even though they're placed in the thigh area, they don't add any bulk and are actually functional enough to hold small items. Personally, I don't see these quite working out for me as business pants or work wear, but I am more than happy with how versatile they are for casual wear. They're perfect for lounging around, running errands, or even working out.

The pants are made out of good material. They are stretchy and comfortable. The only thing that I would say is that if you are five three or under this will be very long. you can make these pants dressy with some heels or more casual with some tennis shoes.

These are more on the “casual” side of “business casual” BUT I can definitely wear these to my job. They are comfortable to wear with cardigans, tunics, and booty-covering shirts. They err more on the side of dressy yoga pants BUT that works for my job. Comfy enough for a night-out outfit too!

评论概述: Soft, stretchy, and comfortable yoga pants
评论详情: **Review for High-Waisted Yoga Pants with Pockets**  These yoga pants are soft, stretchy, and incredibly comfortable. At 5'6", the length hits right at my heels, which I love. The flat seams prevent chafing, and the pockets are big enough to fit my hands. The faux front closure adds a stylish touch. They’re perfect for casual wear and workouts, but I wouldn’t recommend them as business pants since the fit is quite form-fitting.  **Pros:** - Soft, stretchy, and comfortable fit - Flat seams for added comfort - Handy pockets and stylish faux front closure  **Cons:** - Too form-fitting for business attire  Great for activewear or casual outfits, but not ideal for a professional setting.

The pants are great. I have long legs and these pants are perfect for tall woman. The fit was perfect. They are boot cut/bell bottoms which I don’t like so I alternated them to be more narrow. It came out looking great. They have two pockets and are so comfortable I could use  more pairs.

WE got these because it says business casual, but that's not really the case.  My wife didn't like them for work at all.  She works in an insurance office.  She says they are great as maybe workout pants.  But it's not what she would wear to work.  Anyhow -- they are well made, but I guess it depends on the business you are in -- Thanks.

评论概述: My new favorite pants, but runs small.
评论详情: These are very comfortable, soft, stretchy, and well made. They are yoga pants I can wear to work, but they don’t look like yoga pants because of the faux zip up front. They are comfy and they have pockets! They also elongate the leg and make me look taller, which I don’t actually need since I’m almost 6 foot, but it’s always nice to look longer in the legs. Plus, their inseam is actually long enough for me; no more high water pants or showing sock! They do run a little small. I typically order XL for these types of pants, but I’m glad I went up to the XXL, because they would have been stretched a bit too thin and we don’t want to be popping any seams. Regardless, I’m in love with these pants and will be getting more in different colors. Love them!

Imo, these pants are too athleisure looking to wear to work in an office, but they're great for other outfits! They fit comfortably and snug without being unflattering. I prefer more compression for workout clothes,  but I like to wear these with casual outfits or when running errands. They're cute!

These are casual pants that come in comfortable material that feels good on the skin. Spandex makes it more flexible for wearing.  This is suitable for mild weather in Spring and fall.  I picked my pants in navy color.  When properly layered or matched with work jacket it is perfect for business/office environment.  These pants look nice with both heels and flat shoes.

评论概述: Not Work Appropriate & Way Too Long
评论详情: I’m 5’7” and the regular size length was WAY TOO LONG. 4 inches at least.  Plus they are 1000% not work appropriate. They’re just yoga pants.

When these pants arrived, I did not expect anything from them. Their appearance led me to believe that they would never possibly fit me. But the size on them said it was correct.  I am so glad I tried them! Goodness these pants are deceiving! They stretch and still look good! I have no lines or colors showing, and still some mild tummy control!  The legs are quite flared at the cold and foot, especially if youvare short like myself. You may need to hem these.  The brown I obtained is deep and rich in hue. I love pairing them with a rusty shade or an oatmeal/cream color.  DLOODA Women's Work Pants Business Casual Pants High Waisted Yoga Flare Leggings with Pockets Dress Slacks Tummy Control allow me to go from the store to the gym without having to change my pants. For a woman who has mobility problems who usually needs help with dressing, that is a great thing!

I recently got these pants but they have quickly become a favorite in my wardrobe!  These pants are super comfortable! The yoga-style fabric feels soft and stretchy, making them perfect for long days at work or casual outings.  The high-waisted design provides a nice tummy control effect, and the flare leg adds a polished look. Functional Pockets: The addition of pockets is a huge plus—they’re practical and don’t add bulk to the sleek design.  At 5'4", I found the pants a little long, so they work best with heeled shoes or boots. If you’re on the shorter side, you might need to hem them or pair them with taller footwear.  These pants are a great combination of comfort and style, ideal for business casual settings or more relaxed environments. Despite the length, they’re versatile and easy to dress up or down. I’d definitely recommend them!

评论概述: Great pants but these are not work slacks
评论详情: Let me start out by saying these are a fantastic pair of yoga pants. They're very comfortable, really flattering, and aren't see-through. I'm 5'4'' and I only found these to be a tad long. Overall, I'd rate these a solid 5 as a workout pant.  However, this listing says that these can be worn as work slacks (which is the reason I bought them). You cannot wear these to a traditional business office - these definitely look like workout pants. As a result, the pants come with a front panel and stitching that try to make them a pair of slacks, but I think these would be better off just being a casual pant.

These pants are very comfortable and fit well, looks nice enough for work yet, stretchy enough for some activity if you're not the sedentary type.  Best of all, there are two pockets!  Pockets are hit or miss on these style of pants, they are definitely a hit here!  Color is very nice and the fabric is great quality, definitely worth adding to your collection.

These are very comfortable leggings. I had to go a size up so it didn't shrink in the dryer. They're very stretchy and aren't see through. Very flattering on and good quality. They look like work pants but are more like leggings. You get the best of both worlds.
Sizing is accurate. The color is a deep and bold black. Length is accurate. The material is very comfortable and launders well. The waist stays in place fairly well throughout the day.

I'm quite impressed with their comfort and style of this pant. The high-waisted design and tummy control feature provide a flattering fit, while the yoga-inspired fabric offers flexibility and ease of movement. The pockets are a convenient addition, allowing me to keep my phone or other essentials close at hand. The black color is versatile and can be paired with a variety of tops and shoes. Good quality and value.

A well made legging, although not sure if suitable for yoga as the lower part has wider opening. It is comfortable and smooth and breathable. not sure if this would be good idea for casual business, but for daily activity/wear is good. High waisted and has pocket too.

I'm so happy with these, they're really cute, and if I was a little taller they'd be perfect, lol. I can't hold the fact that the pants are too long against these pants just because I have incredibly short legs., lol. Aside from that they are really comfortable, and fit really well.

评论概述: remind me of yoga pants from back in the day
评论详情: These are nice pants with pockets. I know they call them business causal pants and they put a mock zipper on the front, but these are totally like the yoga pants I used to get years ago with boot cut bottoms. I'm 5'8 and they're a little long on me, so just keep that in mind, otherwise they fit great and I'm in the 230s.

评论概述: Stylish, and comfortable pants for formal and informal settings
评论详情: These pants arrived in a vacuum sealed package. Item is as described on the Amazon product page.  They are very comfortable to wear due to the very soft and stretchy fabric. The stitching is of very high quality. They will withstand long wear and usage.  They fit very well and look so nice. These pants will look awesome in a formal or casual setting.  Very satisfied with these pants.
these pants are the best, stretchy and comfortable. definitely recommend 100%

Compré estos pantalones para ir al trabajo (maestra). Adquirí dos, uno negro y otro azul. Los he usado desde agosto 2024, dos veces por semana cada semana y siguen como nuevos. Los pedí XL y mido 5' 3" tuve que cortarlos pero lo hice yo misma con una tijera afilada y no fué necesario ponerles ruedo o coserlos. La tela es cubridora y muy flexible, se siente genial poder agacharse en el salón de clases con confianza y comodidad. Estoy esperando que tengan disponible otros colores para comprar más 🤗

I originally purchased one pair of these pants to wear to physical therapy after knee replacement surgery.  I like them so much! They are comfortable for physical therapy and for any other occasion! I am 5'7" and 170 lbs. I bought XL and love the fit. They fit smoothly over my hips and are not skin tight down the legs, with a nice flare.  They are long (I usually wear with tennis shoes.) They wash up nicely on delicate cycle and come out of the dryer wrinkle free. They do not sag or bag with extended wear. Frankly, I haven't worn jeans or any other tight/uncomfortable pants since I got these.
Really comfy!!!
A little bit long but super comfy
Purchased product for work out pants. High waist is great. Bottoms are perfectly wide....no tripping. True to size.

These yoga pants are soft and comfortable and fit true to size.  They are flattering and stretch easily.  While they work great for exercise, they are nice enought to wear out if you need to run errands or walk the dog.  The pockets are big enough to hold my phone.  They have a drawstring waist so that you can adjust it for a more comfortable fit.  For the price, they are a good pair of yoga pants.
These are stretchy and comfy but have some weight to them so they aren't clingy or show through.  I'm super picky about pant quality and I am happy to say this was a great purchase.

Even though these pants are pretty decent and somewhat comfortable... I personally don't like the material. I prefer more of a knit material. They are way too long. So if you're 5"4' like me, expect to make some major adjustments on the bottom of these pants. I took one star off, because for me...like I said, I am just not fond of the material. But other than this... They seem to be pretty decent pants.
I'm 5'5 155lbs and ordered a M. I'm very happy with the fit but could have sized up aswell. I love the stretchy material and the high waist. I also like the tie waist snd pockets.

I ordered the DLOODA Women's yoga pants for lounging around the home. They have a very comfy fit and are super stretchy. I would call them true to size. The leg is wider than I would expect regular yoga pants to be, and I really like this about those pants. I'm not in love with the material. It feels cool on the skin, and I wish it felt softer. Otherwise, it's a great pair of lounge pants.

These pants are very comfy and very versatile! Ordering clothes online is tricky, especially from a new brand, and I have been disappointed many times in the past with things being way too small. I'm 5'3", 128 pounds, so I typically wear a small, but even after consulting the size chart, I ordered a medium, just in case. Once they arrived, I could tell I should've ordered the size recommended by the size chart because the pants are unfortunately too big, which is such a bummer because they are cute! It's definitely my fault, so no stars deducted. I think the bottom half of the size chart is most helpful, where it lists height and weight recommendations, that's the one that said I should order a small. About the fit, they do come up very high on your waist, like above the belly button, but not uncomfortable. And they are plenty long enough, like too long on a shorter girl like me. The fabric is definitely stretchy, and feels like it will be cooling if you are warm, it's not thick at all. These would be great for work, school, running errands, probably even exercising. Overall, I would recommend these pants! Just make sure to use the size chart, it's accurate!
I am 5'1 and 127lbs and I ordered a size medium. These were very comfortable and fit great. A little long but not the worst.

These pants have a great feel to them - and overall they fit quite well. They are rather loose in the legs - more than I was expecting. They have a drawstring tie which isn’t really needed (for me at least) but it doesn’t bother anything to have it. Overall a comfy pair of pants that work well for stretching, yoga, lounging, or other similar activities. They go through the wash cycle with no issues as well.

I am positively ecstatic when I can find a great pair of pants that fit well, look great, and still manage to be comfortable, and thus I was positively ecstatic when I tried these on, although they still have to go to my seamstress to be hemmed.  I'm 5'4", and they need to lose about three inches in length for me.  I ordered a size Small according to the 6th listing photo for size guides, and I could not ask for a better fit aside from length.  I think they're worth the hemming!  Definitely recommend!

评论概述: A nice fitting mid-high waist stretchable lounging/workout pant
评论详情: My lady is a workout fiend. She's at the gym 4 days a week minimum, and it shows. This means she needs quite a resume of workout garments. This includes of course some kind of pants to wear to and from the gym. This set fits that function quite well. She says they feel nice, not too hip-hugger (which she hates) but not frumpy looking either. They have a very faint "bell bottom" effect on the legs, which makes getting them off quite easy, and also adds a touch of style (if you like that style, of course) It is subtle, not over the top. The material is a spandex polyester blend, and seems pretty rugged and durable, given the type of garment it is. Wife says "five stars". She had no problem with them, and found the fit of the "MEDIUM" size to be very good for her 5'5" 115 pound body. I think she looks great in them, but of course I am biased. :-) Nice pants. No issues.

The yoga pants work well in multiple yoga positions. Sizing accurate for me. The fabric is cool to the touch, something to be aware of, especially if it's cold out, but they're very comfortable and stretchy. Love the pockets. Love the length which is longer than norm for yoga pants.

I really like the material and feel of these yoga pants. It’s a good weight - not too thin and has a good amount of stretch. They have front slit pockets and a drawstring - although I don’t think the drawstring is needed. Unfortunately, at 5’2”, 125 lbs, these are way too long for me (see my photo). I will probably have to hem these up about 3” to be able to wear them. They did not shrink after washing on warm with a cold rinse and medium dryer heat. I ordered the medium.

评论概述: A bit on the short side, but overall very comfy
评论详情: I'm 5'4 and about 130 lbs, these pants fit my nicely through the waist/hips/thighs. Fitted but not tight on my butt, baggier on my legs. The only sad thing is that I have to sag these a bit to get them to be the length I want. Maybe I wear things a little higher-waisted than some, but I was hoping these would be a bit longer. Overall the feel of the material is buttery and VERY stretchy. The drawstring does not look bumpy under a tight shirt, it's minimal, not sure if it's necessary. It isn't for me since these fit me nicely. If you want a baggier fit or longer length, size up.

Why do manufacturers assume if you wear a larger size you are taller?  Size chart shows the inseam gets longer with each increase in size.  Bizarre.  Please start offering petite or at the very least one inseam length in all of the sizes.  That said, these have a very flattering fit.  I am a 5’3, 14/16 and ordered the xxl based on the measurements.  So, order by the size chart and not your usual size.  The material makes me think of a very thick swimsuit material.  Lots of stretch, drapes well. Love that they have pockets.  The drawstring annoys me and I am debating taking it out.  For those of us who like our shirts to come down over the top of the pants, the drawstrings add weird bulk under the shirt.  Overall, a nice wide leg sport pant.

The pants are made from a nice heavy athletic material that drapes nicely.  They fit true to size, though a bit long on me (I'm 5'3" wearing a medium so all pants are long on me).  The fit at the waist is comfortably snug like the waistband of good leggings.  The pockets are a nice size.  The drawstring is a "real" drawstring, so you can tie them on if you want to put something heavy in the pockets.  I do plan to pass these along since I forgot that I hate wearing synthetics and therefore will not wear these again.

I ordered these for my 11-year-old daughter, who is just under 5 feet tall. These fit her perfectly, and she loves how comfortable the fabric feels, especially the wide drawstring waist. These are a great value for the price, and I would definitely order these again.
These pants are well made.  The fabric is nice and stretchy.  It fits true to size.  If you're petite, the length will be a little long.  These pants are great to travel in or to wear out.
Stretchy and light weight. Comfortable. Form fitting. Breathable material.
The pants stay put and are comfortable. The only drawback is these aren't meant for short people. Will have to trim 3-4 inches off the bottom.

These pants will take you anywhere.  Nice quality and extremely comfortable fit..  I’ll be wearing these to the gym, walking the trails, running errands.  Big deep pockets are a must for pants and these deliver.  Comfortable drawstring at waistline to give that perfect fit.    They wash and dry like a charm. Highly recommend.

I found these to be really comfortable and actually well made. The stitching is good and I thought it was well designed. The tie in the front is functional which is great because I can adjust how tight they are. It's made out of a thick legging material and the only note is that it will show underwear lines. I used the size chart and they fit great, I'm 5'8 & 150 lbs and the length was good too. I usually use a size 27 in jeans and an M in pants and I think I probably could've gotten a size M in these despite the size chart saying to get an L. I think since I can adjust the fit around my waist.

There isn’t much bad to say about these at all, as they are good all-around in every aspect that matters. The sizing is accurate— I got a medium and they fit me perfectly. The material is stretchy but not as thin as skin-tight leggings, which is exactly what I was going for.  They are easy to clean in a washing machine with warm water. The tag says not to dry clean them but I did this and they turned out just fine, so use your discretion and wash them however you want. The price is very fair for a pair of gym pants, and they look pretty good too.  They are versatile, too— I wear them in the house and go with them to the gym, which is nice because you don’t need to get changed back and forth. They are definitely a good buy and I’d recommend them to just about anyone. They get a 5/5 from me.

We got these looking for a general-purpose casual flexible lightweight pants which would adapt from lounging to shopping in public to even popping out to casual social events. For these needs, these fit the bill.  The material is light-weight and reasonably comfortable, if not cozy or "luxe" in any sense; the workmanship is fine as expected. We don't expect these to last forever but neither do we fear them falling apart. They're on the "nicer" side of anonymous fast fashion.  The cut and fit are forgiving and as they should be, don't call any attention.  Great addition to a weekenend bag given their ability to adapt from full- to mostly- casual.

These pants are not necessarily super stylish, but they are very comfortable and versatile for travel. If you’re looking for something lightweight and easy, that you can dress up or down, these are great. Plus, pockets. They wash and wear it really easily, and don’t wrinkle at all. Recommend.

I've had this for about a couple months now. I like it overall, and it seems to be of decent quality. I got a large which is my usual size and lengthwise it met my expectations but the waistband was tighter than I'd like. Its pretty soft and comfortable though otherwise.
fit great, sooooooo comfortable to wear

These yoga pants are so comfortable and fit as expected. Surprisingly nice fit, actually. Great for around the house but I also pair with tunics for outings. Washed nicely, wrinkle free for effortless care.

These pants fit as expected. The fabric is a little bit on the thicker side, but not too much so. They are very soft and I like that they have a wider waistband that doesn't dig in. I am 6' tall and these are full length on me. This is great for me, but may mean these will be very long on others with less height. I find them to be very comfortable. They washed well with no color bleed, fading, or shrinkage. I would recommend.

评论概述: A little tight, but still looks good
评论详情: I think I was expecting these to be a little looser in the waist, but I think they might run a little small. They always fit great in the morning, but by lunch time, my burrito baby is pushing on the elastic and that can be a little uncomfortable. The pants look nice and feel nice. I feel like I can wear them out and about, not just when I'm working out.

评论概述: Just right (though I did size up a little)
评论详情: Because of the slight "tummy control" aspect of these pants, I sized up slightly. I like this because it allows me to wear it higher or lower with equal comfort. I think it would be ideal if they were slightly longer, but they hit on me where they did on the model, so I can't really complain about that. Comfortable, lightweight, moves well, okay to wear out or at home. Enjoying them so far.
These pants are nice and comfy and fit true to size.  Nice material and very flowy and soft.  Nice stretchy waistband.

These were surprisingly comfortable. The length was great too. Being a tall person (just under 5’9”), I had expected these to be short. However, they are the perfect length and provide plenty of stretch for yoga. The only negative is the waist band. They are meant to be higher waisted but there’s no compression in the waist and as I sat for longer periods of time to do computer work, the waist rolled down. Other that that, I would highly recommend these pants.

These are my new favorite lounge pants!  I have tried pants like these before and they are so unflattering but these DLOODA yoga pants are fitting at the top and widen out as they go down the leg so they fit snuggly/nicely and look SOOOO good! These pants are soft like butter to the touch as well!  I never thought I would find something better/more comfortable than leggings but these. Are. It!

These pants are a perfect fit and are very soft, smooth and comfortable.  Because they have a slight sheen, they can be paired with a dressy top and worn anywhere nice clothing is required. They are also comfortable enough to wear for yoga and exercise or just lounging around the house. I got these for a cruise and they worked well paired with a dressy top and strappy sandals for dinner in the main dining room. They were great the next day paired with a t-shirt and running shoes for walking around the exercise track! Fantastic versatility and comfort in every situation.

I love these palazzo wide leg pants.  The fabric is silky, go on smoothly, flow and are just plain comfortable to wear.  The waist band is wide and not binding.  The slash pockets give it a relaxed, cozy feel.

I got these pants to wear to work but the material is silky feeling and they look more like pajama pants than work pants,but overall I do like them. They are soft and comfortable and very stretchy. I wear them around the house.
Love its high-waisted design.  comfortable and flattery!  Fabric is soft and breathable.  Great for everyday wear.

This is my 3rd pair of similar-style pants because I love that the style is super comfy but can be dressed up for work with a nice shirt & accessories. This pair won’t be as great for that goal. They’re so shiny—think swimsuit material. In some ways, I like them better than the other two pairs I have. These have a normal width waist, not a really high fold-down (like true yoga pants), and they have pockets. They fit great, though they’re a tad bit long for me (I’m 5’4”). My original pair, which are a different brand, were perfectly versatile: flowy, fit nicely, pockets. But they started to pill in the thigh area. I think these might not do that, since the fabric is heavier, but I just don’t know about the material.

评论概述: light weight, very flexible and great for different activities
评论详情: Loose fit, very baggy and light weight Really comfortable and great for exercise, it gives you all the flexibility needed and also keep you cool True to size, just order what you need  This is more a lounge or exercise pants rather than a yoga pant, really like it
Very comfortable material. Will be perfect for summer evenings/walks. It’s very stretchy. I’m usually a medium in athletic pants and that’s what I got.

评论概述: shorter on taller gals, sizing tricky
评论详情: These pants have a shiny look and silky feel more like I should be lounging.  They do have pockets.  I typically wear a womens 12 and I got a medium.  These are snug to tight on the waist but the legs have plenty of room.  I think someone smaller would wear this size better.  I'm also on the taller side so I have to pull these down and set the waist on my hips to get the length to fall lower on my ankle and look correct.

评论用户: 3 Pugs, 2 Puggles, a Chug, a Terrierist
评论详情: These wide leg Yoga Pants are great! I was super excited when these pants arrived in the mail. I put them on and WOW they are so comfortable. The material is well made and super soft. The waistband is stretchy, so yoga pants are not too tight. The length is also very nice, because finally something is long enough. Easy to wash and wear over and over. I would recommend these to anyone looking for very comfortable yoga pants, sleeping pants, running errands pants.

These dark black wide leg pants are so comfortable.  The material is 80% nylon 20% spandex which is very soft.  The waist band is wide (almost 4”) which prevents that “rolling down” that happens sometimes with elastic waist items.  There is material gathered below the waistband which provides for the loose yoga pant type fit.
Even though the loose feeling of this pants is something new to me, I still love them, they are great, they came sized appropriately and are very well made, highly recommended.
Soft stretchy material. Wide waistband does not roll down or fold. Wide legs are great for causal or dressy outfits. Has great deep pockets. Definitely recommend. 10/10

These pants are well made and soft. However, they were just a bit too small for me. It is my own fault for not double checking the measurements on their size chart. I normally wear xxl, so I thought size 18-20 would fit, but if I had looked at the actual measurements I would have known it'd be too tight.
Well made, good stitching, stretchy giving material. Deep and roomy pockets. Wide and comfortable waist elastic, and does not roll. Washes well and dries quickly.
These are loose and super comfortable. I’d love it if they were just a little longer, because I’m tall, but they’re great for lounging around in

Fit as expected.  The length is good on me, hits at my ankles, just a hair short on me but much better than most pants are on this tall frame.They are soft and very comfortable!  Great for running errands and just lounging around the house.  I don't yoga LOL.

I'm 5'3", 165 pounds. I got the XL. The pants fit perfectly. When I stand in bare feet, the hem touches the floor. The fabric is silky but not too shiny and not too light. The waistband is super comfortable and flattering (not bulky), and the little gathers add interest. The legs are wide. These yoga pats are great for exercising or just casual wear.

These wide leg pants are sooo comfortable! I could seriously wear these anywhere. Great for lounging around the house, working out at the gym or you can dress them up & wear them out. I’m definitely a girl who appreciates comfort over appearance, but you get both with these. They’re cute & feels like you’re wearing pajamas. Actually, most of my pajamas aren’t this comfortable. The waist band is wide & sits high on your waist & hips. They don’t slide down at all. Even better, they have pockets! The material is very soft & stretchy. They also do not collect static and cling to your leg like some wide leg pants in this style. They are true to size & machine washable. The length is perfect. I’m 5’6” and they reach the floor without shoes but don’t drag. Long enough that I could wear heels if I wanted to. Seriously, don’t hesitate to order a pair of these. They’re unbelievably comfortable. You won’t regret it.

The best thing about these pants is the fabric.  It is soft and stretchy and feels very upscale.  The cut is comfortable and loose, if not terribly flattering.  I love the deep pockets.  They are ideal for lounging, which is one of my favorite activities.They are quite short on me, though.  I am taller than average, 5'8", and this is often an issue, but I ordered a Medium instead of a Small hoping that would help!  The model in the image I am thinking is maybe 5'4" as the length on her is great.
